metadata.title: CVE-2021-47176 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/dasd: add missing discipline function Fix crash with illegal operationexception in dasd_device_tasklet. Commit b72949328869 ("s390/dasd: Preparefor additional path event handling") renamed the verify_path function forECKD but not for FBA and DIAG. This leads to a panic when the pathverification function is called for a FBA or DIAG device. Fix by defining awrapper function for dasd_generic_verify_path().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
